client.monitor

Class ServerMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>

          • client.monitor.Monitor
            • client.monitor.ServerMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<GameProcess>, java.util.Collection<GameProcess>, java.util.List<GameProcess>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class ServerMonitor
extends Monitor
    ServerMonitor manages GameProcess if the server is running.

    1.0
